c1.name: Snowswept Sakura
c1.descriptionRaw: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color> by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.
c1.description: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

c2.name: Blizzard Blade Seki no To
c2.descriptionRaw: When casting <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color>, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.
c2.description: When casting Kamisato Art: Soumetsu, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

c3.name: Frostbloom Kamifubuki
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Ebb and Flow
c4.descriptionRaw: Opponents damaged by <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color>'s Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.
c4.description: Opponents damaged by Kamisato Art: Soumetsu's Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

c5.name: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dance of Suigetsu
c6.descriptionRaw: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.
c6.description: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.
